thread.title: What's Next In The Race For Speaker Of The House?
thread.title_full: What's Next In The Race For Speaker Of The House?

title: What's Next In The Race For Speaker Of The House?
text:
What's Next In The Race For Speaker Of The House? October 10, 2015 8:19 AM ET 
Audio for this story from Weekend Edition Saturday will be available at approximately 12:00 p.m. ET. 
Congressman Kevin McCarthy dropped out of the House Speaker race on Thursday. NPR's Scott Simon talks to a member of the House Freedom Caucus, Rep. Mick Mulvaney about the race for Speaker.
